name: Combine It!
description:
It's easy to play, but can you make the right figure to fit the blocks? What about making a perfect level?
Challenge yourself with 300+ unique levels and enjoy bonus levels with awesome animations - turn those grey blocks into bright and shining colors.

This unique game won't leave you bored!It's free and so addictive..

Simple controls:
- Drag to move cubes, they will merge together when they collide
- Keep dragging to place them into the right spots!

In how many moves can you beat the giraffe level?
